title: Surface Collection
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Surface Collection configured in Contentful
custom_steps: WHEN the getSurfaceCollection api call is made with the collection slug
custom_expected:
THEN the surface config and data will be returned for all surfaces associated with collection
AND it will be retuned in a single api response
AND the surface builder app can select which surface is displayed

title: VSM Content SSO
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a VSM content item is tagged “Require login” in Forge
AND the configured URL points to a resource on http://mlb.com

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN  the user is logged into the MLB App
AND the content in tapped in a Headline Stack, Mixed feed, or Editorial Carousel module on the Home surface
OR the content in tapped in a Editorial Feed Module or Editorial Carousel module on the News surface
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be automatically logged into http://mlb.com  before they are taken to the resource

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is not logged into the MLB App
AND the content in tapped in a Headline Stack, Mixed feed, or Editorial Carousel module on the Home surface
OR the content in tapped in a Editorial Feed Module or Editorial Carousel module on the News surface
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not be automatically logged into http://mlb.com before they are taken to the resource

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN  the user is logged into the MLB App
AND the user has already been automatically logged in to http://mlb.com 
AND the content in tapped in a Headline Stack, Mixed feed, or Editorial Carousel module on the home surface
OR the content in tapped in a Editorial Feed Module or Editorial Carousel module on the news surface
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user taken to the resource in a logged-in state if the user’s token is still valid on mlb.com.

title: Story Content SSO - Pass Credentials to Tagged Content only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a piece of content in Forge is tagged with the require-login flag
custom_steps: WHEN the item is included within the selection list of a Editorial Stories Module on home  or a Stories Module on news
custom_expected: THEN pass the users auth token to that webview / story so that a user that is logged in on the app will be logged in when loading that story content

title: Story Content SSO - Hide Story For Unauthenticated Users
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is not logged in
custom_steps: WHEN a Story that tagged require-login in Forge is included in the selection list for a Stories or Editorial Stories module
custom_expected: THEN filter that story out and do not show that within the Module
